title: 2019 Week 4 Recap
itunes:title: 2019 Week 4 Recap
description:
A room filled with heroes - Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler, Chris Wesseling and Gregg Rosenthal recap each and every game of Week 4 including the Bills making a statement but coming up short (2:42), the Browns absolutely dominating the Ravens (19:19) and the Vikings offensive line crumbling against a strong Bears defense. (25;56). The heroes end the show by recapping the Sunday Night Football game between the Saints and the Cowboys. (1:20:49).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
